snippet: Valve, the uncorporate but influential video game company, thinks it may be onto the next big thing in games: wearable computing.
abstract: Valve, uncorporate but influential video game company, may be onto the next big thing in games: wearable computing; its new goggles could unlock game-playing opportunities, letting players lose themselves inside a virtual reality and eventually blend games with their views of the physical world; company tries to foster unorthodox thinking by having no traditional management structure.
lead_paragraph: Valve, the uncorporate but influential video game company, thinks it may be onto the next big thing in games: wearable computing.

headline.seo: Valve, a Video Game Maker With Few Rules
headline.main: Game Maker Without a Rule Book
